column1: *Phrase on a draft of Thrórs Map: "Lheben teil brand (word)#Noldorin i annon ar nêl neledhi gar godrebh" ("Five feet high the gate and three by three they go through together" or "Five feet high the door and three may walk abreast" (translation by Gandalf of the Old English runes on the map)http://www.jrrvf.com/~glaemscrafu/texts/cartedethror-a.htm Thrórs map inscription at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 27 June 2011))
